title: EVRART / COFFEE TABLE
description: a quick table interaction where you find a different key card to get out of the harbour at night.

dialogueTree.title: Coffee Table: "A large table with two huge vacuum-..."
dialogueTree.english: A large table with two huge vacuum-insulated thermal coffee dispensers. Someone has forgotten a small plastic card next to the stacks of cups.
dialogueTree.polish: Duży stół z dwoma próżniowo izolowanymi, termalnymi podajnikami kawy. Ktoś zostawił przy stosach kubków małą plastikową kartę.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Вялікі стол з двума вакуумнымі ізаляванымі, тэрмальнымі раздатчыкамі кавы. Хтосьці пакінуў каля стосу кубкаў маленькую пластыкавую картку.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Peer into a discarded coffee cup!"
links.english: Peer into a discarded coffee cup!
links.polish: Zajrzyj do wyrzuconego kubka na kawę!
links.belarusian: Загляні ў выкінуты кубак для кавы!

links.title: You: "Look into one of the old coffee cup..."
links.english: Look into one of the old coffee cups.
links.polish: Zajrzyj do jednego ze starych kubków na kawę.
links.belarusian: Зірні ў адзін са старых кубкаў для кавы.

links.title: Coffee Table: "You see nothing exceptional. It's a..."
links.english: You see nothing exceptional. It's a dirty cup, smudged brown, with old ground coffee stuck to the bottom... slowly getting mouldy.
links.polish: Nie widzisz nic wyjątkowego. To stary, poznaczony brązowymi smugami kubek, do dna którego przylgnęła stara zmielona kawa. Powoli pleśnieje.
links.belarusian: Ты не бачыш нічога асаблівага. Гэта старая чашка, пакрытая карычневымі палосамі, да дна якой прыліпла старая молатая кава. Паступова плісневе.

links.title: You: "What am I supposed to see here?"
links.english: What am I supposed to see here?
links.polish: Co ja mam tu niby zobaczyć?
links.belarusian: Што я павінен тут убачыць?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Look closer!"
links.english: Look closer!
links.polish: Przyjrzyj się uważnie.
links.belarusian: Прыгледзься ўважліва.

links.title: Coffee Table: "If you squint your eyes enough the..."
links.english: If you squint your eyes enough the coffee grounds almost seem to make up two letters: F... and K.
links.polish: Jeśli zmrużysz odpowiednio oczy, zmielona kawa wydaje się niemal układać w dwie litery: K... A.
links.belarusian: Калі прышчурыш вочы, молатая кава здаецца амаль укладваецца ў дзве літары: К... А.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's a clue!"
links.english: It's a clue!
links.polish: To poszlaka?
links.belarusian: Гэта падказка?

links.title: You: "A clue of what?"
links.english: A clue of what?
links.polish: Dotycząca czego?
links.belarusian: Што датычыцца?

links.title: Inland Empire: "A clue about the person behind all..."
links.english: A clue about the person behind all the murders.
links.polish: Osoby, która jest odpowiedzialna za te wszystkie morderstwa.
links.belarusian: Асоба, якая адказная за ўсе гэтыя забойствы.

links.title: Logic: "Yeah. Of course. It's certainly not..."
links.english: Yeah. Of course. It's certainly not just an example of *paréidolie*, noticing patterns in noise. Worth it.
links.polish: Tak, oczywiście. To, rzecz jasna, nie jest bynajmniej zwykły przykład *paréidolie*, dostrzegania wzorców w szumie. Warto było.
links.belarusian: Так, канешне. Гэта, зразумела, зусім не звычайны прыклад *парэйдоліі*, успрымання ўзораў у шуме. Варта было.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's meaningful, I *swear*! You jus..."
links.english: It's meaningful, I *swear*! You just wait... I've got the case nearly busted wide open.
links.polish: To coś znaczy, *przysięgam*! Tylko poczekaj... Już mam prawie rozpracowaną całą tę sprawę.
links.belarusian: Гэта нешта значыць, *клянуся*! Толькі пачакай... Я ўжо амаль разабраў усю гэтую справу.

links.title: You: "It *is* a sign! Just like a remote..."
links.english: It *is* a sign! Just like a remote viewer would operate. Signs hidden inside the mundane...
links.polish: Ale to *jest* znak! Tak właśnie działają zdalni obserwatorzy. Dostrzegają znaki ukryte wśród niepozornego...
links.belarusian: Але гэта *знак*! Так менавіта дзейнічаюць дыстанцыйныя назіральнікі. Яны заўважаюць знакі, схаваныя сярод незаўважнага...

links.title: Inland Empire: "You got it, pal. I would *never* ma..."
links.english: You got it, pal. I would *never* make such a thing up.
links.polish: No właśnie, stary. *W życiu* nie przyszłoby mi do głowy coś takiego zmyślić.
links.belarusian: Ну вось, стары. *У жыцці* мне б такое не прыйшло ў галаву прыдумаць.

links.title: You: "Uh-huh, great. I somehow doubt old..."
links.english: Uh-huh, great. I somehow doubt old coffee is how the police solve investigations.
links.polish: Ehe, świetnie. Jakoś wątpię, żeby policja prowadziła śledztwa na podstawie starej kawy.
links.belarusian: Эге, цудоўна. Неяк сумняваюся, што міліцыя праводзіць расследаванні на падставе старой кавы.

links.title: Logic: "You would be correct."
links.english: You would be correct.
links.polish: I masz w tym rację.
links.belarusian: І ты ў гэтым маеш рацыю.

links.title: Inland Empire: "If you can't trust your own eyes, w..."
links.english: If you can't trust your own eyes, who can you trust? Certainly not Kim. He's so... suspicious.
links.polish: Jeśli nie możesz ufać własnym oczom, to komu? Na pewno nie Kimowi. Jest bardzo... podejrzany.
links.belarusian: Калі нельга давяраць уласным вачам, то каму? Напэўна, не Кіму. Ён вельмі... падазроны.

links.title: Inland Empire: "If you can't trust your own eyes, w..."
links.english: If you can't trust your own eyes, who can you trust...
links.polish: Jeśli nie możesz ufać własnym oczom, to komu...?
links.belarusian: Калі ты не можаш давяраць уласным вачам, то каму...?

links.title: You: "Huh, okay. Thanks, this certainly w..."
links.english: Huh, okay. Thanks, this certainly wasn't a waste of time.
links.polish: Hm, okej. Dzięki, to ani trochę nie była strata czasu.
links.belarusian: Гм, добра. Дзякуй, гэта зусім не было марнаваннем часу.

links.title: Coffee Table: "You throw the cup back into the tra..."
links.english: You throw the cup back into the trash bin.
links.polish: Wrzucasz kubek z powrotem do śmietnika.
links.belarusian: Выкідваеш кубак назад у сметніцу.

links.title: You: "Pick up the card."
links.english: Pick up the card.
links.polish: Podnieś kartę.
links.belarusian: Падніміце карту.

links.title: Coffee Table: "You snatch up the red plastic card...."
links.english: You snatch up the red plastic card. It features a black contour of a crane lifting a container. The name 'Etienne Hogarth' is written in the middle, below it in smaller text: 'Member of the board'. It comes with a magnetic strip -- meant to open electronic doors.
links.polish: Bierzesz czerwoną, plastikową kartę. Widnieje na niej zarys podnoszącego kontener żurawia. Pośrodku widnieje imię „Etienne Hogarth”, poniżej zaś drobnym drukiem napisano „Członek rady nadzorczej”. Na karcie jest pasek magnetyczny służący do otwierania drzwi elektronicznych.
links.belarusian: Вы бярэце чырвоную, пластыкавую карту. На ёй відаць контур пад'ёмнага крана. У цэнтры напісана імя "Эцьен Хогарт", ніжэй дробным шрыфтам напісана "Чалец назіральнага савета". На карце ёсць магнітная паласа для адчынення электронных дзвярэй.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.english: [Leave.]
links.polish: [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: [Сыходзь].
